inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: urine sample provided immediately prior to biopsy

exclusion.label: does_not_trigger
exclusion.evidence: no history of invasive treatment for benign prostatic hyperplasia within 3-6 months

notes: Patient is a 63-year-old man presenting to the Emergency Department with acute urinary retention. He has a large prostate and bladder filled with urine, but recent blood chemistry was normal.
